firework-embed.numberFloatingButtonHorizontalOffsetInfo: Horizontal offset (px) for Floating Button player.
firework-embed.selectSizeInfo: Thumbnail size. Does not apply to grid mode. Defaults to large.
firework-embed.textFloatingButtonURLLabel: Floating button Call to Action URL
firework-embed.textFloatingButtonURLInfo: Call To Action URL. Only applies to Floating Button player.
firework-embed.selectPlaylistInfo: Playlist ID for selected content. Please note channel name is necessary.
firework-embed.textChannelMissing: Some channels missing? Click below to update widget.
firework-embed.checkboxPIPInfo: Please note, [necessary prerequisites](https://docs.firework.tv/web/faq-and-troubleshooting#picture-in-picture-mode-is-failing) needs to be met for PIP to work properly.
firework-embed.numberFloatingButtonVerticalOffsetInfo: Vertical offset (px) for Floating Button player.
firework-embed.selectOpenInInfo: Where to open video player on thumbnail click.
firework-embed.selectPlacementInfo: Minimized player and Floating Button placement
firework-embed.textFloatingButtonCTALabel: Floating button Call to Action text
firework-embed.selectChannelInfo: Channel name from which content should be displayed.
firework-embed.textFloatingButtonCTAInfo: Call To Action text. Only applies to Floating Button player.
firework-embed.textHashtagInfo: Hashtag for selected content. Please note channel name is also necessary.
firework-embed.selectLayoutInfo: How you would like your videos to be displayed.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

collection.label: Collection

colors_solid_button_labels.info: Used as foreground color on accent colors.
colors_solid_button_labels.label: Solid button label

colors_text.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

paragraph__grid.content: Affects areas with a multicolumn layout.

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals, and cart pop-ups.

type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)
